places.name: Fort Worth Stockyards
places.description: The Fort Worth Stockyards is a historic district that is located in Fort Worth, Texas, United States, north of the central business district.

places.name: Water Gardens
places.description: The Water Gardens are a celebrated urban Texas masterpiece by architects Philip Johnson and John Burgee.

places.name: The Perot Musem
places.description: The Perot Museum of Nature and Science is a natural history and science museum in Dallas, Texas, in Victory Park.

places.name: The Dallas Zoo
places.address: 650 S R.L. Thornton Fwy, Dallas, TX 75203
places.description: Dallas Zoo is a 106-acre zoo located 3 mi south of downtown Dallas, Texas. And it has a petting zoo!

places.name: Hutchins BBQ
places.address:
9225 Preston Rd, Frisco, TX 75033,
1301 N Tennessee St, McKinney, TX 75069
places.description: Some of the best BBQ in all of Texas

places.name: The National Videogame Musem
places.description: The National Videogame Museum is a video game museum about the history of video games and the video game industry, located in Frisco, Texas.

places.name: The Reunion Tower
places.description: Reunion Tower is a 561 ft observation tower in Dallas, and one of the city's most recognizable landmarks.

places.name: The Botanical Garden
places.description: The Dallas Arboretum and Botanical Garden is a 66-acre beautiful botanical garden
